events.title: Suffering People
events.description: The staff of Kama-ZONE are in a group and conversing with a serious look on their faces. This is an unprecedented event.

options.response: The staff starts talking about the suffering they got from the recently emerged outlaws' bullying. It's time for the Guardian to take action.
The conversation is painfully obvious. It's probably just some trivial gossip. There's no need to waste your time.

events.title: Outlaws
events.description: A rough-looking crowd comes over looking for trouble. They seem to be the ones who bullied the staff.

options.response: These types are like weeds and won't die down after one or two tramplings, but you do what should be done.
You lower the outlaws' resolve to fight with your god-like shooting skills. What are the security androids of Kama-ZONE been doing while they run wild?

events.title: Systems Down
events.description: You find the shut down security androids of Kama-ZONE.

options.response: You find out the security android's have all been turned off. There's no sign of physical damage, so they must have lost their functionalities for other reasons. You head to the security center to find clues.

events.title: Dereliction of Duty
events.description: You head to Kama-ZONE's security center and meet with the chief of security.

options.response: The security chief only gives different excuses. There's a bounty on the outlaws, and the chief suggests inquiring about them at the bounty office and dealing with the outlaws yourself.

events.title: Dead or Alive 1
events.description: You arrive at the bounty office. You can inquire about bounty hunting as the security chief said.

options.response: You accept a wanted poster from the android. The person on it seems to be a weak target.
notes: A powerful boss awaits you at the end of this challenge.

options.response: You receive your bounty for bringing justice. It's not a hefty sum, but it's proof of your efforts towards rectifying justice.
Taking down outlaws is important too, but there are other pressing matters. You walk away.

events.title: Dead or Alive 2
events.description: You arrive at the bounty office. There are 3 outlaws left.

options.response: You receive the wanted poster from the android. For some reason, the person on it seems extremely angry.
notes: A powerful boss awaits you at the end of this challenge.

options.response: You receive your bounty for bringing justice. The shining bottle caps praise your hard work.
Taking down outlaws is important too, but there are other pressing matters. You walk away.

events.title: Commission Collection
events.description: You meet with the security chief who had been waiting for you and the bounty office. The security chief demands a commission from the bounties you received.

options.response: You swiftly refuse the greedy security chief's request. The security chief threatens you with cutting off further bounty inquiries if you don't pay up.
You're mad but pay the commission. The sight of the security chief smiling as he receives the sack of silver coins makes you angry, but you hold back for Kama-ZONE's peace.

events.title: Dead or Alive 3
events.description: You arrive at the bounty office. There are 2 outlaws left.

options.response: You receive the wanted poster from the android. The person on it seems willing to do anything for money.
notes: A powerful boss awaits you at the end of this challenge.

options.response: You receive your bounty for bringing justice. However, your righteousness itself is more valuable than this bounty.
Taking down outlaws is important too, but there are other pressing matters. You walk away.

events.title: Dead or Alive 4
events.description: You visit the bounty office for the final bounty.

options.response: You receive the wanted poster from the android. Oh dear, this one is awfully ugly.
notes: A powerful boss awaits you at the end of this challenge.

options.response: You receive the bounty for bringing justice. All outlaws causing trouble in Kama-ZONE have been arrested. Everyone will express their gratitude!
Taking down outlaws is important too, but there are other pressing matters. You walk away.

events.title: Sheriff of Kama-ZONE
events.description: For your services of driving out the outlaws from Kama-ZONE, the staff nominates you as the sheriff of Kama-ZONE!

options.response: You give a speech about doing what needed to be done. You put on your badge while being applauded by the people.
notes: Unlocks #[Gesture of Reconciliation], #[The Security Chief's Office], #[Dead or Alive: Survivor] and #[High Noon]{{cite|not exactly sure which event this one is unlocked from. Though the High Noon description ''does'' mention "avenging their boss"}}

events.title: Gesture of Reconciliation
events.description: The security chief invites you over. He wants to apologize for all the mean things he's done and offers a toast of reconciliation.

options.response: It's a trap! While you're drunk on sparkling barley tea, the security chief attacks you. You're caught off guard and don't even get a chance to retaliate.
notes: Unlocked from #[Sheriff of Kama-ZONE#Give a speech.]

options.response: Reconciliation is not possible at this point. You ignore the underhanded coward and leave.

events.title: The Revenant
events.description: You wake up at a strange place. Your entire body aches from wounds during the ambush.

options.response: You pull your weary body up and take a slow, deep breath. A cold fury fills your heart. It's time for revenge.

events.title: The Unforgivable
events.description: You go after the security chief for revenge. His face turns pale out of fear after seeing you return from the dead.

options.response: You and the security chief start a fierce gunfight with a table between each other. Soon, the security chief judges he's at a disadvantage and flees. You must chase after him!
notes: All Heroes take damage by 20% of their own max HP.

events.title: The Searcher
events.description: You chase after the security chief! You're almost out of breath, but can't let him go like this.

options.response: You chase after the security chief, but end up losing him. Unlike his appearance, he's quite agile.
The bullet hits him square in the leg. He won't make it very far from being shot!

events.title: Last Stop
events.description: You finally succeed in driving the security chief into a corner. He claims he only did as he was told and begs for his life while giving incomprehensible excuses.

options.response: You don't have the slightest thought of forgiving him. The security chief looks like he instinctively felt his fate and attempts a final struggle. It's time to give him his eternal rest!

Vengeance only leads to more vengeance. You decide to cut the cycle of hate and let the security chief go. He bows repeatedly to express his gratitude and leaves into the sunset after giving you a key to his safe.

events.title: The Security Chief's Office
events.description: As Kama-ZONE's sheriff, you visit your office. This was originally used by the security chief.

options.response: You take the marvelous sheriff's badge. Everyone will recognize you from far away unless they're blind.
You fashionably place the dual pistols on your hip. Double the guns, double the bullets, and double the bounty!
Formality is important. You take some clothing that will help maintain your class as a sheriff.

response: There's an obviously heavy and strong-looking lock on the safe. Without its key, it will be impossible to open the safe.

After you open the safe with the key from the security chief, there's a bag of silver coins and a suspicious note with a message. "How did you like my gift? Shut down the security androids when I give the signal."
results: Acquire silver coins, Chain event complete.

events.title: Dead or Alive: Survivor
events.description: It's news about fresh outlaws appearing in Kama-ZONE. It's time for the sheriff of Kama-ZONE to take action.

options.response: You receive the wanted poster from the android. You get a feeling the person on it is a master of schemes from his sharp mustache.
notes: A powerful boss awaits you at the end of this challenge.

options.response: You receive your bounty for bringing justice.
Taking down outlaws is important too, but there are other pressing matters. You walk away.

events.title: Dead or Alive: Conqueror
events.description: It's news about fresh outlaws appearing in Kama-ZONE. It's time for the sheriff of Kama-ZONE to take action.

options.response: You receive the wanted poster from the android. Sorry to say, but this one seems to be on fire.
notes: A powerful boss awaits you at the end of this challenge.

options.response: You receive the bounty for bringing justice. Thanks to your efforts, things will be quiet within Kama-ZONE for a while.
Taking down outlaws is important too, but there are other pressing matters. You walk away.

events.title: High Noon
events.description: The henchmen of the villain you took down, came to avenge their boss.

options.response: You decide to give them a one-way train ticket. The destination is, of course, the underworld.
You attempt to have a calm conversation, but that won't work for some people. You're too soft and end up paying the price.
notes: All Heroes take damage by 20% of their own max HP.

options.response: Any intelligent being can have a conversation. Your cool friend did the talking for you, though. But you got an unexpected gift!
As you start to perform the finale fitting for the villains' final moments, they all pee themselves and flee. You loot the things they left behind.

events.title: The Good, The Bad, and The Dumb
events.description: You witness a gruesome scene of violence towards the weak.

options.response: The gunslinger praises your bravery for firmly stopping him, and requests a duel. You accept with a nod. It will be held at Kama-ZONE's lobby at high-noon.
The weak are destined to be trampled by the strong. It may be different elsewhere, but that's how it is in this place. You continue on your way.

events.title: Gunfight at Kama-ZONE
events.description: Time to duel. Once the bell tolls for noon, you and the gunslinger will draw guns at each other. What's your plan for victory?

response: The bullet you aimed for the head missed, but ricochets off the wall and hits the gunslinger's heart. You expected this to happen, of course.
Your bullet misses, but unfortunately your opponent doesn't and hits you. You go limp and fall down.
results: Acquire silver coins, Chain event complete.
1 random Hero take damage, Chain event complete.

response: The bullet misses your opponent's heart but ricochets off the wall and lands on the gunslinger's head. The bullet didn't miss, it just took a long way around.
Your bullet misses, but unfortunately your opponent doesn't and hits you. You go limp and fall down.
results: Acquire silver coins, Chain event complete.
1 random Hero take damage, Chain event complete.

options.response: Even a slime knows to roll a tumbleweed before a duel. The gunslinger's own ignorance took this one down.
Hekate sees your signal and snipes the gunslinger. If you consider something petty as fairness, then you won't last long in this field. You split the reward with Hekate and celebrate your victory.

events.title: They call me…
events.description: You visit a rundown saloon. You can see all the eyes of outlaws fall on you as the doors open. They shout and ask who you are.

options.response: You proudly identified yourself, but all you got in return were taunts calling you a knight from a fallen kingdom. You leave the saloon feeling down.
Everyone holding a grudge swarm towards you before you can finish speaking. You're overwhelmed and sustain a large injury.
notes: All Heroes take damage by 30% of their own max HP.

options.response: The outlaws have heard of your notoriety and offer a toast. You come back to your senses after drinking with them cheerfully, but it was too late when you realized your belongings were gone.
You use your jurisdiction as a sheriff to arrest the outlaws and confiscate their equipment.
results: Acquire 1 random A[High|Pursuiter's Glasses], A[High|Outlaw's Facemask], A[High|Heavy Firearms Case], A[High|Combat Pants of Pride], A[High|Peacemaker]

events.title: Dirge
events.description: You hear a bizarre sound coming from somewhere. It's hard to tell whether it's music or just some random noise.

options.response: You get curious and follow the bizarre noise.
It's probably the sound of a bull worm with a full stomach farting. You decide not to worry about it.

events.title: The Warmth of the Dead
events.description: You find a man who's not moving a bit. Perhaps there was a snake in his boot? There's a shiny object inside his mouth.

options.response: You take the somewhat cool object from his mouth, but you feel a bit uneasy about it.
Judging by his horrific appearance, there must be a story behind him. It's no good getting involved, so you move on.

events.title: Special Offer
events.description: You hear a whistle and see a merchant waving at you when you turn around. The merchant boasts and claims there's a lot of high-quality items for sale.

options.response: You purchase the heavy firearms case. With this, you think you can take down all the rabble in a single strike.
You purchase the combat pants of pride. Wearing it gives you a confidence boost.
You firmly tell the merchant you're not buying anything. You won't see the merchant around for a while.
You don't feel the need to purchase any items and walk away.

events.title: Super Discount
events.description: You hear a whistle and see a merchant waving at you when you turn around. The merchant claims to have obtained truly rare items and smiles triumphantly.

options.response: This artifact is Very, VERY LARGE! Now you are finally ready to make straight-up conversations with the outlaws.
You don't feel the need to buy the items and walk away. The merchant yells at you saying how there won't be another chance as you turn around.

events.title: Once Upon a Time in Kama-ZONE
events.description: An archaeologist stops you offering to tell an interesting tale.

options.response: You excitedly listen to the story about a faction of elves that used to live in this place but were chased off once Kama-ZONE started development. It's a shame there aren't any cookies and milk right now.
notes: Unlocks #[The Elf and the Vending Machine]

events.title: The Elf and the Vending Machine
events.description: An elf you've never seen before is snooping around the vending machine. Does she need help?

options.response: When you get closer, the elf hastily runs off. Looking at the vending machine, the drinks are still inside, but there's a trace of someone attempting to cut the wires. It seems you've found the culprit breaking the vending machines.
